body: Design and implementation of computer operating systems; management of various system resources: processes, memory, processors, files, input/output devices.(Credits: 3)(Prerequisites: Prerequisite: CMPSC311 ; CMPEN331)(Additional Attributes: NONE)
contentHtml: Design and implementation of computer operating systems; management of various system resources: processes, memory, processors, files, input/output devices.(Credits: 3)(Prerequisites: Prerequisite: CMPSC311 ; CMPEN331)(Additional Attributes: NONE)
title: CMPSC 473: Operating Systems Design & Construction
